divs: Sighting Detailsi was playing football in the intermerial feild on my school grounds with a couple buddies. i was bored and just looked away at the sky. i saw 3 white light streak torwards one another and once they met up there was a big flashed in a white line then they dissappeared. i quick started running and pointing in the sky so excite at whit i had just saw as i was already a firm believer in aliens
Summary: i lpooked to the sky and say three lights one apppearde to look like a tear drop leaving a red yellow color trail
